content: which fall guys amigurumi will win the crown now you can also host tournaments with this cute free fall guys crochet pattern make a whole bunch of them in colorful colors and see which ones fall and which one will be last one standing features include a round elongated jellybean like body with a white face and long oval eyes they love to rush about trying their best to reach the finish line to qualify winner grabs the crown also included as a bonus pattern video tutorial is also available with the free written pattern so you can crochet along with me as well happy crocheting cheers ami amour ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **instagram** make sure you tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 1 i d love to see **youtube** check out my youtube channel 2 to catch all my crochet tutorials and projects ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 5 5in / 14 cm tall **level ** easy **need to know ** single_crochet in the round how to increase how to decrease how to assemble parts together 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
